channel.title: Maintenance on RaspySix

item.title: Control Arm Replacement
item.description: Replacing the front control arms to tighten up the steering and get rid of worn bushings.

item.title: Shifter Rebuild
item.description: Tightening up the drivetrain feel with a fresh bushings.

item.title: Alternator Replacement
item.description: Planned to make it louder, ended up making it run again. Classic BMW â€” alternator out, fresh one in, back to changing headers soon.
